title: 105_hr2600
content: The text repeals incentive payments for reducing the number of medical education residents and eliminates payment authority for a New York demonstration project. Payment offsets are also addressed. The text prohibits retroactive application of ESRD Secondary Payer Interpretation from April 1995 and extends COBRA continuation coverage for End Stage Renal Disease Medicare beneficiaries for 36 months. Amendments are made to the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 and ERISA to extend COBRA continuation coverage for End Stage Renal Disease Medicare beneficiaries for 36 months. Amendments to ERISA and the Public Health Service Act extend COBRA continuation coverage for qualified beneficiaries under the Social Security Act for 36 months. Amendments to the Public Health Service Act extend Medicare ESRD Secondary Payer period to 36 months for qualified beneficiaries under the Social Security Act. Amendment extends Medicare ESRD Secondary Payer period to 36 months for qualified beneficiaries under the Social Security Act.
